name: CardiacValveProcedures_OpenOrPercutaneousApproach_SCT
title: Cardiac Valve Procedures_Open or Percutaneous Approach_SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a procedure of a surgery on a cardiac valve or valves, whether it is open or percutaneous approach.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cardiac valve procedure using open or percutaneous approach.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent cardiac valve procedures using open or percutaneous approach. Codes used are to be SNOMED CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
